hanzi-su-wiki:
滅

Значения

Разрушаться, гибнуть; разрушать, уничтожать

Мнемоника

Тушить пожар, растаскивая поленья бердышом 戌 и заливая огонь 火 водой 氵. Ликвидировать, уничтожать, в переносном смысле — подавлять восстание.

Варианты

灭
purpleculture_pinyin:
miè
to extinguish or put out; to go out (of a fire etc); to exterminate or wipe out; to drown
потушить или потушить; выйти (из огня и т. д.); истребить или стереть с лица земли; тонуть

heisig_chinese_memo: Water flows down to destroy the march of fire.
heisig_constituent: destroy, water, water droplets, water pistol, march, fire
heisig_story: Picture a march of flames demonstrating against the Fire Department for their right to destroy, but being doused with water by the police riot squads.
myStory:
戌 - знак собаки
戍 - охранять
戎 - варвар
戉 - секира
戊 - пятый циклический
koohiiStory1: Water flows down to destroy the march of fire.
koohiiStory2: Use a water cannon to destroy a line of marching fire monsters. I keep mixing this one up with disaster (#167) and demolition (#400). Remember, you DESTROY monsters (think of the Godzilla movie "Destroy All Monsters!"). Fires and floods are natural DISASTERs. And DEMOLITION is something you carefully do while wearing protective garments. (vaguely based on stefanot´s balrog story).
kunYomi: ほろ.びる、ほろ.ぶ、ほろ.ぼす
jp_example_words:
全滅(ぜんめつ): annihilation
滅びる(ほろびる): to be ruined, to go under, to perish, to be destroyed
滅ぼす(ほろぼす): to destroy, to overthrow, to wreck, to ruin
滅茶苦茶(めちゃくちゃ): absurd, unreasonable, excessive, messed up, spoiled, wreaked
滅亡(めつぼう): downfall, ruin, collapse, destruction
絶滅(ぜつめつ): destruction, extinction
滅多に(めったに): rarely (with negative verb), seldom
jp_readingExamples: 滅びる (ほろ.びる), 滅ぼす (ほろ.ぼす)
WaniKani_Radicals: 氵, 丿, 戈, 一, 火
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Hit by a tsunami the drunkard is propelled down a slide where he hits the ground which is covered in fire. He is immediately destroyed.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Even if he wasn't saved by the slide (to avoid the tsunami) he would be in trouble. Seems like the world just wanted to destroy this drunkard.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: One could say this drunkard met (めつ) his fate.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Strangely, he just came from a Mets (めつ) game, so maybe that's why he had such bad luck.
Ru_Radicals: ノ, 汁 (суп), 戈 (копьё), 火 (огонь)
Ru_trainchinese: miè: (глаг) гаснуть; гасить, тушить; погибать; уничтожать, истреблять
Kanshudo_mnemonic: in water (氵) the fire dog (烕) could be destroyed
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Fire under a roof can end up destroying the house.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " water " and " snap ", the original meaning is to divide. "Shuowen": "Exhaust it. From the water, the sound of gnawing." "Easy Peeling": "Peel the bed to get enough, so as to destroy it."

" Off " can mean extinguished. "Shu‧Pangeng 1": "If the fire is scorched in the pristine, it can't be directed towards, it can still be extinguished."

" Exit " can also mean submerged. "Yi‧Daguo": "Zemu is a big guilty." The meaning of "submerged" can be extended to bury and obliterate. "Xunzi·Chen Dao": "The Ming Lord respects the virtuous and enables him to flourish; the dark Lord is jealous and fears the power and destroys his merit."

" Exit " also means disappearing. "Huainanzi-Yuan Daoxun": "The hatred is formed and the knowledge is tempted outside. It cannot be reversed, and the law of nature is destroyed."

" Exit " can mean death. "Southern History·Fan Ye Biography": "Ye often said that death is annihilation, and he wants to "Wuguilun"."

" Mie " is also a Buddhist term, a free translation of "Nirvana". Sui Huiyuan's "Mahayana Righteous Chapter" Volume 2: "Nirvana does nothing but tranquility, fame will die."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " water " and " snap ", the original meaning is to divide.
humanum_full_description:
從「水」，「烕」聲，本義為除盡。《說文》：「盡也。从水，烕聲。」《易‧剝》：「剝床以足，以滅下也。」

　　「滅」可指熄滅。《書‧盤庚上》：「若火之燎于原，不可向邇，其猶可撲滅。」

　　「滅」也可表示淹沒。《易‧大過》：「澤滅木，大過。」由「淹沒」義可引申為埋沒、抹殺。《荀子‧臣道》：「明主尚賢使能而饗其盛；闇主妒賢畏能而滅其功。」

　　「滅」還表示消失。《淮南子‧原道訓》：「好憎成形而知誘於外，不能反已，而天理滅矣。」

　　「滅」可指死亡。《南史‧范曄傳》：「曄常謂死為滅，欲著《無鬼論》。」

　　「滅」也是佛教用語，是「涅槃」的意譯。隋慧遠《大乘義章》卷二：「涅盤無為恬泊，名滅。」

從「 水 」，「 烕 」聲，本義為除盡。《說文》：「盡也。从水，烕聲。」《易‧剝》：「剝床以足，以滅下也。」 「 滅 」可指熄滅。《書‧盤庚上》：「若火之燎于原，不可向邇，其猶可撲滅。」 「 滅 」也可表示淹沒。《易‧大過》：「澤滅木，大過。」由「淹沒」義可引申為埋沒、抹殺。《荀子‧臣道》：「明主尚賢使能而饗其盛；闇主妒賢畏能而滅其功。」 「 滅 」還表示消失。《淮南子‧原道訓》：「好憎成形而知誘於外，不能反已，而天理滅矣。」 「 滅 」可指死亡。《南史‧范曄傳》：「曄常謂死為滅，欲著《無鬼論》。」 「 滅 」也是佛教用語，是「涅槃」的意譯。隋慧遠《大乘義章》卷二：「涅盤無為恬泊，名滅。」
From the sound of " water" and " snap", the original meaning is to divide. "Shuowen": "Exhaust it. From the water, the sound of gnawing." "Easy Peeling": "Peel the bed to get enough, so as to destroy it." " Off" can mean extinguished. "Shu‧Pangeng 1": "If the fire is scorched in the pristine, it can't be directed towards, it can still be extinguished." " Exit" can also mean submerged. "Yi‧Daguo": "Zemu is a big guilty." The meaning of "submerged" can be extended to bury and obliterate. "Xunzi·Chen Dao": "The Ming Lord respects the virtuous and enables him to flourish; the dark Lord is jealous and fears the power and destroys his merit." " Exit" also means disappearing. "Huainanzi-Yuan Daoxun": "The hatred is formed and the knowledge is tempted outside. It cannot be reversed, and the law of nature is destroyed." " Exit" can mean death. "Southern History·Fan Ye Biography": "Ye often said that death is annihilation, and he wants to "Wuguilun"." " Mie" is also a Buddhist term, a free translation of "Nirvana". Sui Huiyuan's "Mahayana Righteous Chapter" Volume 2: "Nirvana does nothing but tranquility, fame will die."

滅字的基本解释

滅
miè
见“灭”。

滅字的汉语字典释义

[①]［miè］
［《廣韻》亡列切，入薛，明。］
“烕1”的今字。“灭1”的繁体字。
(1)除尽，使不存在。
(2)指被除灭的事物。
(3)熄灭。
(4)淹没。
(5)引申为埋没，抹煞。
(6)消失；隐没。
(7)《春秋》用语。谓用重兵攻占，夺取别的国家或城邑。
(8)指国君被杀。
(9)指死亡。
(10)涂抹。
(11)佛教语。灭度。涅槃的意译。

滅字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　滅； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页642第01
〔古文〕??【唐韻】亡列切【集韻】莫列切，?音搣。【說文】盡也。【周禮·夏官】大司馬九代之，灋外內亂，鳥獸行，則滅之。【註】毀其宗廟社稷曰滅。　又沒也。【易·大過】過涉滅頂。　又火熄也。【書·盤庚】若火之燎于原，不可嚮邇，其猶可撲滅。　又【韻補】叶明祕切，音媚。【曹植·夏啓讚】大戰于甘，有扈以滅。威振諸侯，元功克乂。

滅字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
滅字的起名意思

暂无。

Extinction
Basic explanation of words
Extinction
miè
See "Exit".
Extinction
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［miè］
["Guangyun" dead row cut, enter Xue, Ming. ]
The present character of "烕1". Traditional characters for "消1".
(1) Divide to make it non-existent.
(2) Refers to things that are eliminated.
(3) Extinguished.
(4) Submerged.
(5) The extension is buried and obliterated.
(6) Disappear; disappear.
(7) Terminology of "Spring and Autumn". Said to use heavy troops to capture and seize other countries or cities.
(8) Refers to the killing of the monarch.
(9) Refers to death.
(10) Smear.
(11) Buddhist language. Extinction. Paraphrase of Nirvana.
Extinction
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Water Word Department] 　 Mie; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 642 01
[Ancient text]?? [Tang Yun] dead row cut [Ji Yun] Morie cut, the sound of the sound. [Said the text] Do it all. 【Zhou Li·Xiaguan】In the nine generations of Da Sima, the chaos outside and the inside, and the birds and beasts will be destroyed. [Note] Destroying its ancestral temple and shrine is said to die.　Not again. 【Yi·Da Guo】Going to the end.　The fire went out again. 【Shu·Pangeng】If the fire is scorched in the prairie fire, it cannot be squeezed, it can still be put out.　[Rhyme Replenishment] Ye Ming secretly cuts, the sound is charming. [Cao Zhi·Xia Qizan] Fighting in Gan, there is a fight or annihilation. Powerful princes, Yuan Gong overcomes Yi.

Name meaning

miè
вм. 灭
Radicals: 氵, 丿, 戈, 一, 火  (tsunami, slide, drunkard, ground, fire)
Meaning Mnemonic
Hit by a tsunami the drunkard is propelled down a slide where he hits the ground which is covered in fire. He is immediately destroyed.
Even if he wasn't saved by the slide (to avoid the tsunami) he would be in trouble. Seems like the world just wanted to destroy this drunkard.
Reading Mnemonic
One could say this drunkard met (めつ) his fate.
Strangely, he just came from a Mets (めつ) game, so maybe that's why he had such bad luck.
